帲字的基本解释

帲
píng
帷幕：“华烛光辉深下帲帏。”
覆盖；庇护：“民之疾苦悉赖帲??。”

帲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［píng］
“帡1”的旧字形。

帲字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帲； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页332第19
【集韻】必郢切，音餅。【廣雅】帲覆也。【註】福郢反。　又【類篇】旁經切，音瓶。義同。又屋蔽也。　又【韻會】悲萌切，音綳。幄也。【揚子·法言】然後知夏屋之爲帲幪也。【註】在旁曰帲，在上曰幪。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帲; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 332 19
[Jiyun] must be cut, sound cake. [Guang Ya] Cover also. [Note] Fu Ying is against.　[Classes] Side by side cut, sound bottle. The same meaning. Also sheltered.　[Rhyme Club] Sad and cute, sound fragrant. Yeah. 【Yangtze·Fayan】Then I know that the house of Xia is a girl. [Note] On the side it is 帲, on the upper it is 幪.
